description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by May 30, 2023 by 2:00PM EDT. All bids submitted after 2:00PM EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.      Arena Maintenance Standing Offer: Work under this Standing Offer covers the supply of all labour, materials, equipment, supplementary components and supervision required to make repairs to the mechanical systems and all related equipment for the ice plant in the arena at building number R04.
